description: An Element is a visible entity on a Page. It occupies a specified rectangle area within a Page. An Element may contain child Elements.
title: Element

___opacity.description: Opacity of the element, between `0` to `1`, __animatable__

___element.description: the name of the named _Element_ to inherit properties from

___stream.description: Specifies if the resource specified with the video tag is stream or not, default is `false`

___mask.description: Image mask (PNG with the alpha channel)

___borderWidth.description: Width of the border, default is `0`, __animatable__

___strokeColor.description: Color of the stroke, default is `black`, __animatable__

___h.description: height of the element, default is `"100%"`

___rotate.description: Rotation in degree around the anchor point, clockwise, defalut is `0`, __animatable__

___videoDuration.description: Ending point of the video in seconds

___w.description: width of the element, default is `"100%"`

___videoStart.description: Starting point of the video in seconds, default is `0`

___scale.description: Scaling factor around the anchor point, default is `[1, 1]`, __animatable__

___x.description: x-position of the left-top corner of element, default is `0`

___pos.description: alternative way to specificy the position by the location of the anchor point

___y.description: y-position of the left-top corner of element, default is `0`

___id.description: the element identifier to identify an element in the associated _Scene_
